places_with_reviews.name: Kalyanpur Station

reviews.text: Nestled in the heart of nature's embrace, this accommodation offers a serene retreat away from the hustle and bustle of city life. The peaceful ambiance, coupled with breathtaking views, creates an unforgettable experience. The rooms are tastefully decorated, providing comfort and relaxation after a day of exploration. The staff is incredibly friendly and accommodating, ensuring a pleasant stay from check-in to check-out. Whether you're seeking adventure or simply want to unwind, this hidden gem is the perfect escape. Highly recommended for anyone visiting the area.
It is a nice place to visit and accomodation are  good and very nice time to spend
No doubt it's a Best Place , Accomodations Are Great
Best place to chill with friends and Family and also good ambiance

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL HOLLYWOOD
address: HXV7+F57, Station Rd, Khattalwada, Wadgaon, Maharashtra 442305, India

reviews.text: We could have died and they did not cared!! We had stayed for 3 nights in this hotel in room which had attic attached. So first let me start with the good of stay( which is not much) ~ Veiw, rooms do had spectacular views. Rooms were river facing and had views of beautiful mountains.
